card.title: Bonus Payment
card.text: Each player collects money according to the Bonus Payment table.
card.longText:
Pay from the stock to each player:

- 100,000 for each block of shares.

- 100,000 for each department.

- 200,000 for each main department.

- 150,000 for each member of the board.

- 300,000 for the chairman.

Don't forget to account for the Controlling privilege card!

card.title: Director's Meeting
card.text: This round is over. After the Director's Meeting, the next round begins.
card.longText:
1. Dismiss the chairman.

2. Elect a new chairman.

3. Determine new divisional heads.

4. Hand out privilege cards.

5. Score influence points.

6. Adjust motivation.

7. Hand the app to the head of Communications and click on "New Deck".

card.title: Birthday
card.text: It's the senior president's birthday. The chairman and each divisional head (with the exception of communications) pay 100.000 for the gift to the company (the stock).

card.title: Board Scandal
card.text: The chairman of the board falls out of favor and is prematurely dismissed. As a compensation, he receives 200.000 from the stock. The privilege card chairman loses its validity and is turned face-down.

card.title: Summer Party
card.text: Each member of the board pays 100.000 to the company (the stock).
